text: Mmang ke bue jaana, ka go bua jalo ke buelela Morena: se tlholeng lo tshela jaaka ba ba sa bolokwang ba tshela, gonne ba foufaditswe ebile ga ba sa tlhole ba itse se e leng boammaaruri. Dipelo tsa bone tse di tswetsweng di tletse ka lefifi; ba kgakala thata le botshelo jwa Modimo gonne ba o tswaletse megopolo ya bone, mme ga ba kake ba tlhaloganya ditsela tsa one.
